mapper.sql: A."APPLICANT_STORAGE" as "applicantStorage", A."PROVIDE_STORAGE" as "provideStorage", A."ITEM_NO" as "itemNo", A."DRUG_CODE" as "drugCode", A."DRUG_SPEC" as "drugSpec", A."PACKAGE_SPEC" as "packageSpec", A."QUANTITY" as "quantity", A."PACKAGE_UNITS" as "packageUnits", A."ENTER_DATE_TIME" as "enterDateTime", A."FIRM_ID" as "firmId", A."BATCH_NO" as "batchNo", A."DOCUMENT_NO" as "documentNo", A."NO_PROVIDE_QUANTITY" as "noProvideQuantity", A."FLAG" as "flag", A."SUB_STORAGE" as "subStorage", A."APPLICANT_STORAGE_SUB" as "applicantStorageSub", A."ID" as "id", A."ORG_ID" as "orgId"
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT a.enter_date_time as "enterDateTime",document_no as "documentNo" , d.storage_name as "storageName" FROM DRUG_PROVIDE_APPLICATION a , (select DISTINCT storage_name,storage_code from drug_storage_dept ) d
a.org_id = #{orgId} and d.storage_code =a.applicant_storage
AND instr(','||#{flag}||',' , ','||a.flag||',') > 0
